comments:
When I have this content in the CSS editor (saved or unsaved, does not matter):

--- snip ---
*.class1, { }
*.class2 { }
--- snip ---

I cannot insert any new line between the two lines. Pressing "return" at either
the ending of line 1 or the beginning of line 2 is just ignored.

Are you getting any sort of exception thrown in the log?  Maybe this is a dup 
of bug 110352
*** Bug 110352 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I have verified it is a dup, but will close other as a dup of this one, since
this one is "client found".

I fixed StructuredAutoEditStrategyCSS to guard against null pointers. 
I also fixed 
StructuredTextViewer to do a little better job of catching any exception, 
logging it, but otherwise continuing (so, for example, typing could continue!).

Just for the records, here is the exception that is thrown in my testcase.
Thanks for your help!

*** Bug 114049 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
This change is a bulk update of all _un_targeted, fixed, resolved bugs upon release of M5. This particular bug _might_ have been fixed earlier than M5. (Feel free to correct).

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP defects already verified by the reporter but awaiting closure by the assignee.  If you feel this defect was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
This seems to work with WTP 1.5.2. Thanks for fixing.
